m :  you look tired .  why don ' t you go and have a good rest ?
w :  i wish i could  but i have to finish my report .  my boss will need it tomorrow .

question: why is the woman still working ?
choice: because she doesn ' t like to have a rest .
because she wishes to be a boss someday .
because she has to finish her report .
answer: because she has to finish her report .
